Warhead heard steps on the floor behind him. He could get Gunman to a 
court-martial for not being there when called upon, but he refrained. 
Not for now. He decided, however, to take a cold tone with him.

Warhead: You are late Gunman. Let me resume what has been told during 
your slumber. The Sadisticons, under Ultrabite, are going for Earth. 
They will attack shortly. We are to meet up with them to obliterate 
any unsuspected resistance. Now, Quasacons, we will form our ship mode 
and depart. We'll crush Maximals like we have never done before!!!
